full_summary:
# 8486-228586/C Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

## Notice Details

* Publication Date: November 17, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Tender Status: Expired

## Procurement Details

* Tender Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Territories of Opportunity: None

## Contracted Entities

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* Contact Information:
  Caroline Wolszczan (SPAC/PSPC)
  caroline.wolszczan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18039139?extsite=MTgwMzkxMzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Tender Description

This Request for Standing Offer cancels and supersedes the previous Request for Standing Offer W8486-228586/B (Doc4245418558) dated October 5, 2023, with a closing of November 3, 2023 at 2:00pm EDT. The purpose of this solicitation is to establish a Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of hydraulic oil to the Department of National Defence.

## Special Conditions
All required supporting documentation and offer submission must be submitted on December 4, 2023 by 2:00 PM EST. Any offer submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be considered non-responsive. 

The contracting officer will evaluate tenders based on the lowest price as the primary factor and, if necessary, other factors to ensure the best value for the department.

Please refer to the attached documents for detailed requirements.

If you need more information, kindly contact Caroline Wolszczan at caroline.wolszczan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

(Note that the special conditions stated that offers must be submitted by a specific date and time. Furthermore, any offers submitted after this time and date will be considered non-responsive. Moreover, the contracting officer will use a precursor to evaluate tenders)
